languages.text: {n}Ульфар делает небрежный жест, и двое безмолвных слуг почтительно отступают, дабы не мешать вашей беседе.{/n} "Эттфатер, я должен поблагодарить тебя за спасение. Мне выпала нелегкая битва".

{n}With a twitch of his fingers, Ulfar bids the two servants in attendance to step away so as not to intrude on your conversation. They silently retreat.{/n} "Aett-Vater, I must thank you for saving me. I had a difficult battle."
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар делает небрежный жест, и двое безмолвных слуг почтительно отступают, дабы не мешать вашей беседе.{/n} "Эттфатер, я должен поблагодарить тебя за спасение. Мне выпала нелегкая битва".

traits.locale_text: {n}With a twitch of his fingers, Ulfar bids the two servants in attendance to step away so as not to intrude on your conversation. They silently retreat.{/n} "Aett-Vater, I must thank you for saving me. I had a difficult battle."

{n}With a twitch of his fingers, Ulfar bids the two servants in attendance to step away so as not to intrude on your conversation. They silently retreat.{/n} "Aett-Vater, I must thank you for saving me. I had a difficult battle."

{n}With a twitch of his fingers, Ulfar bids the two servants in attendance to step away so as not to intrude on your conversation. They silently retreat.{/n} "Aett-Vater, I must thank you for saving me. I had a difficult battle."

{n}With a twitch of his fingers, Ulfar bids the two servants in attendance to step away so as not to intrude on your conversation. They silently retreat.{/n} "Aett-Vater, I must thank you for saving me. I had a difficult battle."

languages.text: {n}乌尔法手指抽搐了一下，示意两名仆人离开，不要打扰你们的谈话。仆人们静静地退了出去。{/n}“我必须感谢你救了我一命，狼领。那场战斗非常艰苦。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a twitch of his fingers, Ulfar bids the two servants in attendance to step away so as not to intrude on your conversation. They silently retreat.{/n} "Aett-Vater, I must thank you for saving me. I had a difficult battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法手指抽搐了一下，示意两名仆人离开，不要打扰你们的谈话。仆人们静静地退了出去。{/n}“我必须感谢你救了我一命，狼领。那场战斗非常艰苦。”

languages.text: {n}会話を邪魔されまいと、ウルファーは指をぴくぴく動かして供をしているふたりの従者に下がるよう命令する。彼らは黙って後ろに下がる。{/n}「アエット＝ヴァテル、俺を助けてくれたことに礼を言わないとな。厳しい戦いだった」
languages.original_text: {n}With a twitch of his fingers, Ulfar bids the two servants in attendance to step away so as not to intrude on your conversation. They silently retreat.{/n} "Aett-Vater, I must thank you for saving me. I had a difficult battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}会話を邪魔されまいと、ウルファーは指をぴくぴく動かして供をしているふたりの従者に下がるよう命令する。彼らは黙って後ろに下がる。{/n}「アエット＝ヴァテル、俺を助けてくれたことに礼を言わないとな。厳しい戦いだった」

languages.text: {n}Con un gesto de sus dedos, Ulfar indica a los sirvientes que le asisten que se alejen para no interrumpir vuestra conversación. Se alejan en silencio.{/n} «Aett-Vater, debo darle las gracias por salvarme. Ha sido una batalla difícil».
languages.original_text: {n}With a twitch of his fingers, Ulfar bids the two servants in attendance to step away so as not to intrude on your conversation. They silently retreat.{/n} "Aett-Vater, I must thank you for saving me. I had a difficult battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un gesto de sus dedos, Ulfar indica a los sirvientes que le asisten que se alejen para no interrumpir vuestra conversación. Se alejan en silencio.{/n} «Aett-Vater, debo darle las gracias por salvarme. Ha sido una batalla difícil».

languages.text: {n}D'un geste de ses doigts, Ulfar ordonne aux deux serviteurs présents de s'éloigner pour que vous puissiez discuter tranquillement. Ils se retirent en silence.{/n} « Je dois vous remercier de m'avoir sauvé, aett-vater. J'ai livré un combat difficile. »
languages.original_text: {n}With a twitch of his fingers, Ulfar bids the two servants in attendance to step away so as not to intrude on your conversation. They silently retreat.{/n} "Aett-Vater, I must thank you for saving me. I had a difficult battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}D'un geste de ses doigts, Ulfar ordonne aux deux serviteurs présents de s'éloigner pour que vous puissiez discuter tranquillement. Ils se retirent en silence.{/n} « Je dois vous remercier de m'avoir sauvé, aett-vater. J'ai livré un combat difficile. »

languages.text: {n}Mit einem Fingerschnippen schickt Ulfar die zwei anwesenden Diener weg, damit niemand euer Gespräch stört. Sie ziehen sich schweigend zurück.{/n} "Aett-Vater, ich muss Euch danken, dass Ihr mich gerettet habt. Ich hatte einen schweren Kampf."
languages.original_text: {n}With a twitch of his fingers, Ulfar bids the two servants in attendance to step away so as not to intrude on your conversation. They silently retreat.{/n} "Aett-Vater, I must thank you for saving me. I had a difficult battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem Fingerschnippen schickt Ulfar die zwei anwesenden Diener weg, damit niemand euer Gespräch stört. Sie ziehen sich schweigend zurück.{/n} "Aett-Vater, ich muss Euch danken, dass Ihr mich gerettet habt. Ich hatte einen schweren Kampf."

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, parmaklarını oynatarak orada bulunan hizmetkârlara konuşmanızı bölmemeleri için dışarı çıkmalarını emrediyor. Sessizce gözden kayboluyorlar.{/n} "Aett-Vater, beni kurtardığın için sana bir teşekkür borçluyum. Zor bir savaş geçirdim."
languages.original_text: {n}With a twitch of his fingers, Ulfar bids the two servants in attendance to step away so as not to intrude on your conversation. They silently retreat.{/n} "Aett-Vater, I must thank you for saving me. I had a difficult battle."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar, parmaklarını oynatarak orada bulunan hizmetkârlara konuşmanızı bölmemeleri için dışarı çıkmalarını emrediyor. Sessizce gözden kayboluyorlar.{/n} "Aett-Vater, beni kurtardığın için sana bir teşekkür borçluyum. Zor bir savaş geçirdim."
